forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunder possible. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Low clouds and fog. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
